languages.text: Пространственные врата, ведущие к мирам-гробницам некронов, были запечатаны, и никто не ведал, что происходило на той стороне. Но с окраин освоенных Человечеством систем иногда доходили слухи о кораблях, подобных серпам, что появлялись и исчезали, не предпринимая агрессивных действий... до поры.

The dimensional gate leading to the Necron Tomb Worlds was sealed, and not a soul knew what transpired on the other side. But now and then, rumours came from the fringes of systems settled by Humanity, rumours of sickle-shaped ships that appeared and disappeared suddenly, without showing any signs of hostility... yet.
languages.original_text: Пространственные врата, ведущие к мирам-гробницам некронов, были запечатаны, и никто не ведал, что происходило на той стороне. Но с окраин освоенных Человечеством систем иногда доходили слухи о кораблях, подобных серпам, что появлялись и исчезали, не предпринимая агрессивных действий... до поры.

traits.locale_text: Dimensional gates, opening a passage to Necron Tomb Worlds, were sealed, and not a soul knew, what transpired on the other side. Yet from the fringes of systems settled by humanity now and then arose rumours about sickle-like ships that appeared and disappeared suddenly, not attempting any hostile actions... for now.

Dimensional gates, opening a passage to Necron Tomb Worlds, were sealed, and not a soul knew, what transpired on the other side. Yet from the fringes of systems settled by humanity now and then arose rumours about sickle-like ships that appeared and disappeared suddenly, not attempting any hostile actions... for now.

The dimensional gate that opened a passage to the Necron Tomb Worlds was sealed, and not a soul knew what transpired on the other side. But from the fringes of systems settled by humanity now and then there arose rumours of sickle-shaped ships that appeared and disappeared suddenly, without showing signs of hostility... yet.

The dimensional gate that opened a passage to the Necron Tomb Worlds was sealed, and not a soul knew what transpired on the other side. But from the fringes of systems settled by humanity now and then there arose rumours of sickle-shaped ships that appeared and disappeared suddenly, without showing signs of hostility... yet.

The dimensional gate leading to the Necron Tomb Worlds was sealed, and not a soul knew what transpired on the other side. But now and then, rumours came from the fringes of systems settled by Humanity, rumours of sickle-shaped ships that appeared and disappeared suddenly, without showing any signs of hostility... yet.

The dimensional gate leading to the Necron Tomb Worlds was sealed, and not a soul knew what transpired on the other side. But now and then, rumours came from the fringes of systems settled by Humanity, rumours of sickle-shaped ships that appeared and disappeared suddenly, without showing any signs of hostility... yet.

languages.text: 通往太空死灵墓穴世界的次元门被封锁了，没人知道另一边发生了什么事情。不过，人类定居的星系边缘时不时会传来谣言，说镰刀形飞船突然出现，而后突然消失，没有表现出任何敌意……至少暂时如此。
languages.original_text: The dimensional gate leading to the Necron Tomb Worlds was sealed, and not a soul knew what transpired on the other side. But now and then, rumours came from the fringes of systems settled by Humanity, rumours of sickle-shaped ships that appeared and disappeared suddenly, without showing any signs of hostility... yet.

traits.locale_text: 通往太空死灵墓穴世界的次元门被封锁了，没人知道另一边发生了什么事情。不过，人类定居的星系边缘不时传来谣言，说镰刀形飞船突然出现，而后突然消失，没有表现出任何敌意……至少暂时如此。

languages.text: Das Dimensionstor, das zu den Necron-Gruftwelten geführt hatte, wurde versiegelt. Niemand wusste, was sich auf der anderen Seite abgespielt hatte. Doch vom Rand der menschlich besiedelten Systeme kamen gelegentlich Gerüchte über sichelförmige Schiffe, die urplötzlich auftauchten und wieder verschwanden, ohne Anzeichen von Feindseligkeit zu zeigen ... bisher.
languages.original_text: The dimensional gate leading to the Necron Tomb Worlds was sealed, and not a soul knew what transpired on the other side. But now and then, rumours came from the fringes of systems settled by Humanity, rumours of sickle-shaped ships that appeared and disappeared suddenly, without showing any signs of hostility... yet.

traits.locale_text: Das Dimensionstor, das eine Passage zu den Necron-Gruftwelten geöffnet hatte, wurde versiegelt. Niemand wusste, was sich auf der anderen Seite abgespielt hatte. Doch vom Rand der menschlich besiedelten Systeme kamen gelegentlich Gerüchte über sichelförmige Schiffe, die urplötzlich auftauchten und wieder verschwanden, ohne Anzeichen von Feindseligkeit zu zeigen ... bisher.

languages.text: Le portail dimensionnel qui menait aux mondes-nécropoles nécrons fut scellé et nulle âme ne sut ce qu'il s'était passé de l'autre côté. Cependant, dans les confins des systèmes colonisés par l'humanité, on entendait parfois des rumeurs sur des navires en forme de faucille qui apparaissaient et disparaissaient soudainement, sans montrer de signes d'hostilité... pour l'instant.
languages.original_text: The dimensional gate leading to the Necron Tomb Worlds was sealed, and not a soul knew what transpired on the other side. But now and then, rumours came from the fringes of systems settled by Humanity, rumours of sickle-shaped ships that appeared and disappeared suddenly, without showing any signs of hostility... yet.

traits.locale_text: Le portail dimensionnel qui menait aux mondes-nécropoles nécrons fut scellé et nulle âme ne sut ce qu’il s’était passé de l'autre côté. Cependant, dans les confins des systèmes colonisés par l'humanité, on entendait parfois des rumeurs sur des navires en forme de faucille qui apparaissaient et disparaissaient soudainement, sans montrer de signes d'hostilité... pour l'instant.

languages.text: El portal dimensional que comunicaba con los mundos necrópolis de los Necrones quedó sellado, y ni un alma supo lo que ocurrió al otro lado. Sin embargo, en los límites de los sistemas colonizados por la Humanidad empezaron a surgir rumores esporádicos de naves en forma de hoz que aparecían y desaparecían de repente, sin mostrar signos de hostilidad... por el momento.
languages.original_text: The dimensional gate leading to the Necron Tomb Worlds was sealed, and not a soul knew what transpired on the other side. But now and then, rumours came from the fringes of systems settled by Humanity, rumours of sickle-shaped ships that appeared and disappeared suddenly, without showing any signs of hostility... yet.

traits.locale_text: El portal dimensional que comunicaba con los mundos necrópolis de los Necrones quedó sellado, y ni un alma supo lo que ocurrió al otro lado. Sin embargo, en los límites de los sistemas colonizados por la Humanidad empezaron a surgir rumores de naves en forma de hoz que aparecían y desaparecían de repente, sin mostrar signos de hostilidad... por el momento.

languages.text: ネクロンの墳墓惑星へと続く超次元の門は封印された。その向こう側で何が起こっているのか知る者はいない。しかし時折、人類が定住する星系の周辺からは、敵意を示すことなく突然現れては消える鎌状の船の噂が聞こえてきた…今のところは、であるが。
languages.original_text: The dimensional gate leading to the Necron Tomb Worlds was sealed, and not a soul knew what transpired on the other side. But now and then, rumours came from the fringes of systems settled by Humanity, rumours of sickle-shaped ships that appeared and disappeared suddenly, without showing any signs of hostility... yet.

traits.locale_text: ネクロンの墳墓惑星へと続く超次元の門は封印された。その向こう側で何が起こっているのか知る者はいない。しかし時折、人類が定住する星系の周辺からは、敵意を示すことなく突然現れては消える鎌状の船の噂が聞こえてきた…今のところは、であるが。

languages.text: Nekron Kabir Dünyalarına giden boyutsal geçit kapalıydı ve diğer tarafta ne olup bittiğini bilen tek bir kişi bile yoktu. Ancak arada sırada İnsanlığın yaşadığı uzak sistemlerden söylentiler geliyordu. Orak şeklindeki gemilerin ortaya çıktığına, sonra da "henüz" herhangi bir düşmanlık belirtisi göstermeden kayboldukları ifade ediliyordu.
languages.original_text: The dimensional gate leading to the Necron Tomb Worlds was sealed, and not a soul knew what transpired on the other side. But now and then, rumours came from the fringes of systems settled by Humanity, rumours of sickle-shaped ships that appeared and disappeared suddenly, without showing any signs of hostility... yet.

traits.locale_text: Nekron Kabir Dünyalarına giden boyut geçidi kapalıydı ve diğer tarafta ne olup bittiğini bilen tek bir kişi bile yoktu. Ancak arada sırada İnsanlığın yerleştiği uzak sistemlerden söylentiler geliyordu. Orak şeklindeki gemilerin ortaya çıktığına, sonra da "henüz" herhangi bir düşmanlık belirtisi göstermeden yok olduğuna dair söylentiler.
